localize.text: Your scenario is reaching an end soon.
Just do as you’ve done before.
Although the energy you’ve collected will not be supplied to the outside, that doesn't mean your work was for nothing, or that this place no longer serves a purpose.
Are you finally asking me now? After all this time?
Of course, it’s the same as yours.
The conclusion of the script we have.
If not, I wouldn’t have a reason to go through all this trouble just to help you.
